mapper.select: /* DAY00204_DS_LIST_S */ SELECT 0 AS chk , sicode , 점검번호 AS hd_number , 점검일 AS hd_date , 점검자 , 점검코드 , 점검직종 FROM km_homedrug kh WHERE kh.sicode = #{sicode} AND 점검일 BETWEEN #{date_from} AND #{date_to} ORDER BY 점검일 DESC

/* DAY00204_DS_DATA_S */ SELECT kh.sicode , kh.점검번호 , kh.점검일 , kh.점검확인01 , kh.점검확인02 , kh.점검확인03 , kh.점검자 , kh.점검코드 , kh.점검직종 , kh.약품정보01 , kh.약품정보02 , kh.약품정보03 , kh.약품정보04 , kh.약품정보05 , kh.약품정보06 , USING BINARY),181,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능40 , kh.약품효능05 AS 약품효능5 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),1,20) USING 'euckr') USING USING BINARY),61,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능44 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),81,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능45 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),101,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능46 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),121,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능47 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),141,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능48 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),161,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능49 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능05 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),181,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능50 , kh.약품효능06 AS 약품효능6 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),1,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능51 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),21,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능52 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),41,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능53 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),61,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능54 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),81,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능55 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),101,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능56 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),121,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능57 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),141,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능58 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),161,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능59 , CONVERT(CONVERT(SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CONVERT(kh.약품효능06 USING 'euckr') USING BINARY),181,20) USING 'euckr') USING 'utf8mb3') AS 약품효능60 , kh.org_점검번호 FROM km_homedrug kh WHERE kh.sicode = #{sicode} AND kh.점검번호 = #{hd_number} AND kh.점검일 = #{hd_date}

20, ' ')) , IFNULL(#{약품효능56}, RPAD("", 20, ' ')) , IFNULL(#{약품효능57}, RPAD("", 20, ' ')) , IFNULL(#{약품효능58}, RPAD("", 20, ' ')) , IFNULL(#{약품효능59}, RPAD("", 20, ' ')) , IFNULL(#{약품효능60}, RPAD('', 20, ' ')) ) )
mapper.select: /* 2-04 HOMEDRUG 조회 */ SELECT sicode , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY homenum) AS num , homenum , 약품명 , 효능 , 제조사 , 규격 , 수량 , DATE_FORMAT(유통기한, '%Y.%m.%d') AS 유통기한 , 보관상태 , 확인일 , org_homenum FROM base_homedrug WHERE sicode = #{sicode} AND 수량 > 0 ORDER BY homenum
